jd: From: Prakash, Infoways prakash@info-ways.com Reply to: prakash@info-ways.com Position: Oracle Technical LeadLocation: RemoteDuration: long term contractMandate- Oracle E-Business Suite, Oracle FusionJob description10+ years of experience working with Oracle ERP applications, including at least 3 years in a technical lead or supervisory role. Proven experience with Oracle E-Business Suite, Oracle Fusion, or similar ERP platforms. Technical Skills: Proficiency in Oracle PLSQL, SQL, Oracle Forms, and Oracle Reports. Strong understanding of ERP modules (Finance, Supply Chain, HR) and their configurations. Experience with ERP integrations using RESTSOAP APIs, web services, and middleware. Familiarity with Oracle Database management, including data modeling and performance tuning. Strong leadership skills, with a proven ability to lead teams and drive project success. Excellent problem-solving skills, with the ability to troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues. Effective communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work well with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.Oversee the technical design, development, and deployment of Oracle ERP modules, ensuring alignment with business requirements and best practices.
